author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two years after the murder of a Tasmac salesman, the Serious Crime Squad arrested two persons for committing the crime.

M. Kumar (37) of Chinna Seeragapadi was working as a salesman at a Tasmac outlet in Mallur.

On April 5, 2014, while he was returning home, he was way-laid and robbed of his cash bag. He was admitted to the Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital, where he died the next day.

Superintendent of Police G. Subbulakshmi recently transferred the case to the Serious Crime Squad.

On February 8, while the squad members were on a vehicle check on Attayampatty to Ariyanoor Road, they intercepted T. Gunasekaran (25) and S. Dinesh (28), both of Attayampatty. Inquiries revealed that the two murdered the salesman and took away cash of Rs. 20,000 from his bag. They were arrested.
title: Two arrested in murder case
